title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 §§ 24-2.2 - Prohibited facilities
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 §§ 24-2.2 - Prohibited facilities

State Regulations

No establishment shall make facilities available for the purpose of sexual activities where anal intercourse, vaginal intercourse or fellatio take place. Such facilities shall constitute a threat to the public health. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10
§§
24-2.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
